name: Gabriel Knight: Sins of the Fathers â€“ 20th Anniversary Edition

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Gabriel Knight - Sins of the Fathers 20th Anniversary Edition/GK1.exe

files.installer: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG

content:
script:
  files:
  - installer: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG
  game:
    exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Gabriel Knight - Sins of the Fathers 20th Anniversary Edition/GK1.exe
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
  installer:
  - task:
      description: Creating WINE prefix
      name: create_prefix
      prefix: $GAMEDIR
  - task:
      args: /VERYSILENT /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
      description: Running Setup, please wait...
      executable: installer
      name: wineexec
